Frederick.Way Off Broadway Dinner Theatre:
The Way Off Broadway Dinner Theatre, also known as Way Off Broadway or WOB, is a regional dinner theater and children’s theater located in Frederick, Maryland.


== History ==
The theater was first launched in 1990 as the Keynote Dinner Theatre under the direction of Don Wiswell with a production of the musical Grease. It was not until 1995 when the theater was purchased by the partnership of Pete Peterson, Terrance Warfield, and Jim Watkins that it was renamed Way Off Broadway.
